page.title: 09RECREATION
page.content: RECREATION. During the summer months a high proportion of people spend their spare time gardening;children tend to help or play outdoors with their friends. Country walks are also popular forms of relaxation;there are a lot of dog owners,so these country walks are very much for the family as a whole.When the weather is really warm and sunny many people take themselves to the sea-side,picknicking on the beach and visiting the pub on the way home. Alternitavely,in hot weather,many will sunbathe in their own gardens and cook meals outside on a barbecue.Camping and caravanning are also popular pastimes. In winter people watch television (especilly sport).About half the people own video recorders,so are able to see favourite programmes at leisure
